meanings.definition: More plush or luxurious in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The new sofa felt plushier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: Her bedroom looked plushier after she added velvet curtains.
meanings.sent3: The plushier pillow made the cat purr contentedly.
meanings.sent4: The plushier carpet was like walking on a cloud.
meanings.sent5: The plushier fabric was so soft, it felt like a hug.

meanings.sent1: This blanket is plushier than the one on the bed.
meanings.sent2: The toy bear looked plushier with its new fur coat.
meanings.sent3: The plushier chair made the room feel cozier.
meanings.sent4: The plushier robe was like wearing a warm cloud.
meanings.sent5: The plushier fabric was so comfortable, it was hard to get up.
